description: Related to triangle A056858 of number of rises in set partitions of n at a given index i.
references: W. C. Yang, Conjectures on some sequences involving set partitions and Bell numbers, preprint, 2000. [Apparently unpublished. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 06 2011]
author: Winston C. Yang (winston(AT)cs.wisc.edu), Aug 31 2000
